sense.gloss: to cool (from room temperature), to chill, to refrigerate
to calm down, to cool off, to regain one's composure, to relax
to be frightened (at), to be scared (of)

sdata.j: ↑白↑↓しろ↓ワインは↑出↑↓だ↓す↑前↑↓まえ↓に↑冷↑↓|ひ↓やす|↑方↑↓ほう↓がいいよ。
sdata.e: It's better to chill white wine before you serve it.

sdata.j: ↑暑↑↓あつ↓い↑時↑↓とき↓は、↑首↑↓くび↓の↑後↑↓うし↓ろを↑冷↑↓|ひ↓やす|といいんだって。
sdata.e: I hear that it's good to cool the back of your neck when it's hot.

sdata.j: ↑暑↑↓あつ↓い↑時↑↓とき↓は、↑首↑↓くび↓の↑後↑↓うし↓ろを↑冷↑↓|ひ↓やす|といいんだって。
sdata.e: I hear that it's good to cool the back of your neck when it's hot outside.

sdata.j: その↑銃↑↓じゅう↓どうしたの？↑本物↑↓ほんもの↓？↑危↑↓あぶ↓ないから↑下↑↓お↓ろしなさい。↑冷↑↓ひ↓や↑冷↑↓|ひ↓やす|るから。
sdata.e: What are you doing with that gun? Is that real? Put it down, that's dangerous. You're freaking me out a little.
